title: Level 15 Reward Missing
body:
Hello, 

I just turned level 15 and saw that it said I won a chest and some other thing but when I go to the loot tab it is not there. Anyone else having this problem? Am I looking in the wrong place? Help please. 

Thank you in advance.

{{champion:117}}

replies.body:
The new client shows a popup with a chest picture when you level up, which makes people think they've won a chest. You actually don't win anything special at level 15, and that chest picture shows up at every level up. 

TBH Riot should probably remove it, it's very misleading.

I'm not aware of a level 15 chest/key. There's one for level 5, but afaik, we don't award one for level 15.

Let me know if you have any questions.
